subject: [Radiance-general] Klems_full.cal: -b kbin(S-E)
body:
What I am going to try does not come from the error message (because I see
the modifier there)... try putting the *kbin()* between ""... that is

-b kbin(0.7,-0.7,0,0,0,1) --> -b 'kbin(0.7,-0.7,0,0,0,1)' -- or --> -b
"kbin(0.7,-0.7,0,0,0,1)"

Also, I see you are missing a comma there...

Bye!


2015-05-27 12:30 GMT-03:00 <urtza.uriarte at upc.edu>:
